ONTOP_PROTOTYPE.TITLE: OnTop Prototype
ONTOP_PROTOTYPE.DESCRIPTION: Prototype development for a major IT project using Angular, TypeScript, and SCSS. Built reusable components and modular structures across three core environments, directly supporting 15K+ monthly active users.
ONTOP_PROTOTYPE.LEARNED: Advanced Angular component architecture, TypeScript best practices, SCSS modularization, and building scalable front-end applications. Gained experience in cross-environment development and performance optimization.

CRUD_PACTO_SOLUCOES.TITLE: CRUD Pacto Soluções
CRUD_PACTO_SOLUCOES.DESCRIPTION: Full-stack CRUD application built with Angular and TypeScript. Implemented RESTful API integration, form validation, and responsive UI design. Delivered a complete solution for data management with modern web technologies.
CRUD_PACTO_SOLUCOES.LEARNED: RESTful API integration patterns, Angular forms and validation, TypeScript type safety, and building complete CRUD operations. Enhanced skills in data management and user interface design.

CRUD_FISCON.TITLE: CRUD Fiscon
CRUD_FISCON.DESCRIPTION: Enterprise CRUD application developed with Angular and TypeScript. Focused on robust data management, API integration, and clean code architecture. Delivered scalable solution for business operations.
CRUD_FISCON.LEARNED: Enterprise application architecture, complex data management, API design patterns, and TypeScript advanced features. Improved understanding of business logic implementation and code organization.

ELEMENTS.TITLE: Elements
ELEMENTS.DESCRIPTION: HTML/CSS/JavaScript project showcasing modern web development fundamentals. Built interactive UI components and responsive layouts using vanilla JavaScript and CSS3. Demonstrated core front-end development skills.
ELEMENTS.LEARNED: HTML5 semantic structure, CSS3 advanced features including flexbox and grid, vanilla JavaScript DOM manipulation, and responsive design principles. Strengthened foundation in core web technologies.
